member.summary: Configure the API parameters.

member.param: Order quantity of perpetual contracts to buy or sell
Order price of perpetual contracts to buy or sell.
Closing trigger. When creating a closing order, it is highly recommended to set as true to avoid failing by insufficient available margin.
member.remarks: As of 20190117 ByBit only support order quantity in an integer.
